pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, April 28, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, April 28, 2016:

Shoal Lake 40 First Nation, Ontario

The Prime Minister will visit the community of Shoal Lake 40 First Nation.

Private.
